## pipeline

```{bash}
datasets download genome accession GCF_900187175.1 --include genome,protein,cds,gff3
datasets download genome accession GCF_000190535.1 --include genome,protein,cds,gff3

makeblastdb -in Csp.key_genes.faa -out Csp.key_genes.faa -dbtype prot
makeblastdb -in Csp.key_genes.ffn -out Csp.key_genes.ffn -dbtype nucl
blastn -query genome_Osp/GCF_000190535.1.ffn -db genome_Csp/Csp.key_genes.ffn -evalue 1e-5 -max_target_seqs 5 -num_threads 10 -outfmt 6 -out GCF_000190535.1.btn.m8
blastp -query genome_Osp/GCF_000190535.1.faa -db genome_Csp/Csp.key_genes.faa -evalue 1e-5 -max_target_seqs 5 -num_threads 10 -outfmt 6 -out GCF_000190535.1.btp.m8
blastx -query genome_Osp/GCF_000190535.1.ffn -db genome_Csp/Csp.key_genes.faa -evalue 1e-5 -max_target_seqs 5 -num_threads 10 -outfmt 6 -out GCF_000190535.1.btx.m8
```
